name: Lido
description: Liquid staking for Ethereum and Polygon. Daily staking rewards, no lock ups.

name: Binance staked ETH
description: A token created by depositing BETH into the BETH wrapper. Each WBETH represents 1 BETH (1:1 to staked ETH) plus all of its accrued ETH2.0 staking rewards

name: Rocket Pool
description: Rocket Pool is the first truly decentralised Ethereum staking pool. Liquid Staking, Audited SC, and Minimised Penalty Risk. Unlike solo stakers, who are required to put 32 ETH up for deposit to create a new validator, Rocket Pool nodes only need to deposit 16 ETH per validator. This will be coupled with 16 ETH from the staking pool (which stakers deposited in exchange for rETH) to create a new ETH2 validator.

name: mETH Protocol
description: A permissionless, non-custodial ETH liquid staking protocol deployed on Ethereum L1 and governed by Mantle.

name: Stader
description: Stader offers the most convenient & safest way to maximize your returns on staking.

name: Coinbase Wrapped Staked ETH
description: Coinbase is allowing customers who stake ETH to receive an ERC20 utility token called Coinbase Wrapped Staked ETH (“cbETH”), which is a liquid representation of their staked-ETH.

name: StakeWise V2
description: Stake your ETH and manage your capital flexibly with the principal and yield tokens from StakeWise.

name: Frax Ether
description: Frax Ether is a liquid ETH staking derivative designed to uniquely leverage the Frax Finance ecosystem to maximize staking yield and smoothen the Ethereum staking process for a simplified, secure, and DeFi-native way to earn interest on ETH.

name: StakeStone STONE
description: One-Stop Staking Protocol For Omnichain LST Liquidity.

name: Benqi Staked Avax
description: Stake AVAX on BENQI's Liquid Staking Protocol and freely utilize it within powerful Decentralized Financial applications.

name: Liquid Collective
description: Liquid Collective is a non-custodial staking protocol launched on Ethereum. Liquid Collective is built and run by a collective of leading web3 teams. The protocol was initially launched in 2023.

name: slisBNB
description: slisBNB is the yield bearing & liquid staking token for Lista DAO, which appreciates against BNB in line with BNB's staking APR.

name: Treehouse Protocol
description: Treehouse is a decentralized application that introduces Treehouse Assets (tAssets) and Decentralized Offered Rates (DOR), new primitives that enable fixed income products in digital assets.

name: Swell Liquid Staking
description: Swell is a non-custodial liquid staking protocol

name: Tonstakers LSD
description: The Open Network Liquid Staking protocol empowering TON DeFi ecosystem

name: TruStake
description: The TruStake vaults provide access to institutional liquid staking on a variety of proof-of-stake networks.

name: Volo
description: Volo is a decentralized liquid staking platform dedicated to offering vSUI as a fully decentralized LST for SUI and supporting the ecosystem's growth with LSDFi yield strategies

name: GLIF
description: Filecoin's premier DeFi protocol for lending/borrowing FIL.

name: Origin Ether
description: Origin Ether engages with Ethereum staking pools and LP strategies. It uses platforms like Convex and Curve, and plans to integrate with other AMMs, aiming to provide higher yield opportunities

name: SpringSui
description: Spring Staked SUI (sSUI) is the first LST built using the SpringSui standard. It offers significant improvements over existing LSTs, most notably instant unstaking. Instant unstaking allows for infinite liquidity when unstaking, enhancing safety by reducing the risk of depegging. In the future, other teams will be able to deploy their own LSTs on the platform permissionlessly and at no cost using the SpringSui Standard

name: Haedal Protocol
description: Haedal is a liquid staking protocol built on Sui that allows anyone to stake their SUI tokens to contribute to governance and decentralisation of the Sui blockchain. In the meantime, users will get haSUI in return so that they can continue to participate in DeFi activities to earn additional yields.

name: Meta Pool Near
description: Meta Pool is a liquid staking protocol built on the NEAR blockchain.

name: Crypto.com Staked ETH
description: Liquid staking is available for ETH! Earn rewards and receive tradeable CDCETH

name: Dinero (pxETH)
description: Dinero is a suite of products that scale yield for protocols and users. Dinero consists of a high yield staking solution (pxETH), a collateral-backed stablecoin (pxUSD), and a transaction relayer.

name: StackingDAO
description: Start stacking STX, review your existing STX locked in PoX, and unstack at any time, for the best price.

name: Stride
description: Stride is a protocol for multichain liquid staking in the Cosmos ecosystem

name: Veno Finance
description: Easy and Reliable Liquid Staking on Cronos chain

name: bemo
description: The liquid staking protocol on the TON blockchain.

name: SiloStake
description: Liquid staking and MEV focused protocol on Sei.

name: Bifrost Liquid Staking
description: BIfrost ((https://bifrost.finance) is a substrate developed web3 derivatives protocol that provides decentralized cross-chain liquidity for staked assets. Bifrost’s mission is to provide standardized cross-chain interest-bearing derivatives for Polkadot relay chains, parachains and heterogeneous chains bridged with Polkadot.

name: Aftermath afSUI
description: afSUI is Aftermath's liquid staked token that you receive when you stake SUI through their protocol. afSUI acts as a fungible extension of Sui's native staking mechanism, enabling permissionless delegation and enhanced capital efficiency through its deep DeFi integrations.

name: Lolik Liquid Staking
description: Lolik is a decentralized liquid staking platform that supports staking on leading EVM blockchains including Ethereum, Polygon, and Bahamut. Anyone can participate in the staking process with their web3 wallet (e.g. MetaMask) directly through the platform, and earn daily rewards.

name: stake.link liquid
description: Effortlessly stake your crypto assets with stake.link's easy to use, secure liquid staking protocol.

name: NodeDAO
description: Experience the ease of staking on Ethereum 2.0 through NodeDAO's liquid staking service.

name: GoGoPool
description: GoGoPool is the first permissionless staking protocol built for Avalanche Subnets and node operators to launch  for cheaper and faster using the GGP token. Currently, we cater to node operators and liquid stakers.

name: Ankr
description: Liquid, secure, and easy to integrate staking infrastructure.

name: Hatom Liquid Staking
description: Liquid Staking is a module that allows users to stake their EGLD without locking up its value and receive a token called Staked EGLD (sEGLD)

name: Lair Finance
description: Lair is a liquid staking derivative service that allows users to stake their KAIA to accrue staking rewards without locking their assets.

name: Acala Liquid Staking
description: Liquidity for staked assets. Instant redeem. Available for Polkadot and Kusama.

name: Stakee
description: Earn TON with best APY at most profitable staking service.

name: Hydro Protocol
description: Ultimate LSD & LSDFi Infrastructure Platform on Injective

name: VenomStake
description: VenomStake is a liquid staking platform on the Venom Blockchain that simplifies the process for users. It enables users to delegate their digital assets to a validator, who uses these to enhance and secure the network. By staking their assets, users gain rewards based on their contribution's amount and duration. VenomStake is dedicated to providing a secure and intuitive environment for managing staking activities and monitoring rewards.

name: STFIL
description: STFIL is a decentralised non-custodial liquidity market protocol where users can participate as suppliers or borrowers. Suppliers provide liquidity to the market to earn a passive income, while SPs are able to borrow in an overcollateralised (perpetually) or undercollateralised (one-block liquidity) fashion.

name: Beethoven X sFTMx
description: sFTMx Liquid Staking.

name: Kava Liquid
description: Kava Liquid is a liquid staking protocol where users can stake KAVA for bKAVA.

name: NeoBurger
description: Delegate your NEO Governance to NeoBurger to mint bNEO and receive GAS

name: Tensorplex
description: Liquid Staking for Decentralised AI Networks such as Bittensor.

name: Sceptre Liquid
description: Sceptre is an innovative multi network Liquid Staking solution build by Rome Blockchain Labs, with extensive knowledge and experience in Liquid Staking.

name: GETH
description: With GETH, you can hold or trade your staked assets at any time, without having to wait for Phase 2 of Ethereum 2.0.

name: Drop
description: Drop is a liquid staking protocol for Interchain assets and a member of the Lido Alliance. Drop is on a mission to strengthen the economic viability of sovereign blockchain economies by transforming stagnant, frozen capital into flowing streams of opportunity

name: SpringSui Ecosystem
description: SpringSui Ecosystem LSTs are those that have been deployed using the SpringSui Standard

name: Acala LCDOT
description: Liquid Crowdloans

name: MilkyWay Zone
description: MilkyWay offers a liquid staking solution for Celestia's TIA

name: uniIOTX
description: UniIOTX is the first ever Liquid Staking dApp on IoTeX. UniIOTX token holders can earn staking rewards while keeping the tokens in play for trading, lending, or any other DeFi ventures.

name: ExinPool
description: ExinPool is a staking platform of Exin in Mixin Network

name: Hatom TAO Liquid Staking
description: Liquid Staking is a module that allows users to stake their wTAO without locking up its value and receive a token called Staked wTAO (swTAO).

name: UTONIC
description: UTONIC is the first TON restaking platform and revenue-sharing layer for one billion users

name: Core Earn
description: Liquid Staking on the Core Network. Users deposited CORE and get stCORE

name: WaterNeuron
description: Liquid staking protocol

name: Tenderize V2
description: Liquid Staking 2.0 - Stake to the validator of your choice and earn staking rewards. Use your validator specific LSTs in DeFi.

name: SFT Protocol
description: SFT Chain, a 'Chain of Chains', bridges physical infrastructure with Web3, focusing on a DePIN platform that integrates storage, computing, edge CDN , and beyond.

name: Swapscanner LSD
description: Officially deposit KLAY and vote in Klaytn governance through Swapscanner, a member of Klaytn's governing body GC

name: sICX
description: sICX is a token that represents a share of a pool of staked ICX, so it’s always accruing staking rewards and compounding automatically.

name: KLAYstation
description: KLAYstation is a staking tool based on the Klaytn Network, that has now introduced the sKLAY token, a liquid staking solution

name: Artemis Finance
description: Artemis Finance is a liquid staking protocol designed exclusively for Metis Decentralised Sequencer Pools. Users can stake their METIS token on Artemis Finance and receive the liquid token - artMETIS.

name: Increment Liquid Staking
description: Liquid Staking Protocol on Flow.

name: Filet Finance
description: Filet is a decentralized Filecoin staking protocol that has been deployed on the Filecoin (FVM), Binance Smart Chain (BSC), and HECO network. Launched in May 2021, Filet is open source and has been audited by Certik. Additionally, Filet is an official member of Filecoin's FVM Early Builder and Mainnet Cohort projects.

name: Endur
description: xSTRK - Liquid Staked STRK

name: Stafi
description: Liquid staking provider.

name: LISA
description: The Goddess of Liquid Stacking, Brought to you by ALEX, Ryders Fast Pool, and Xverse Pool.
